title: Lavender

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may protect a player's house at night, providing Power Defense against one attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will know if your target was attacked.
- If your target is directly attacked, you will attack anyone that visits your target.
- You will know how many people you attack.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided to protect (player)."
"Your target was attacked!"
"You attacked (#) player(s) visiting your target!"

"You were attacked but someone fought off your attacker!"
"You were ambushed by a Lavender!"
"They were ambushed by a Lavender."

desc:
Post 159
*You are a loyal protector that guards others for her family.*
